fields.Title: TRIBUNAL / LEGITIMACY OF THIS TRIBUNAL
fields.Description: "Does Krenel give you the right to conduct tribunal?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "You only have time for *one* argume..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You only have time for *one* argument, choose wisely...

fields.Title: You: ""Krenel does not give you the right..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Krenel does not give you the right to conduct a tribunal!"
fields.Alternate1: "Does your employer give you the right to conduct tribunal?"

fields.Title: You: ""You were called *Downwell* once. W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were called *Downwell* once. What happened?"

fields.Title: You: ""This tribunal is against the law...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This tribunal is against the law. The international law."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""No one's going to give a shit abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one's going to give a shit about dead loincloths." He snorts. "That's reality."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""What always happens when you get g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What always happens when you get good at your job. That name meant night raids, fucking extra-judicial funkytime... burned villages. Shit that sounds bad on the radio."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Now fire! Fuck them up! DO IT! The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now fire! Fuck them up! DO IT! The muscles on your back tense up...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Easy, now... Tell them these men di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy, now... Tell them these men didn't do it. There's a peaceful way out!

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, what's the highest rank i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, what's the highest rank in Krenel?"

fields.Title: You: "C'mon head, give me an argument!"
fields.Dialogue Text: C'mon head, give me an argument!

fields.Title: De Paule: ""We're not fucking coming anywhere,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're not fucking coming anywhere, seolite!"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You're right. But you see..." he p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. But you see..." he pauses and smiles. "I *want* it to end in bloodshed."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""The same thing happened when we we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The same thing happened when we were called whatever-the-fuck it was. Probably won't be called *Krenel* for much longer either..." He looks around.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Nah... I just have the biggest gun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nah... I just have the biggest gun." He raps on his armoured barrel-like chest.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "International-something?! Internati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: International-something?! International law!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Okay -- it's not much. But he's thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay -- it's not much. But he's thinking about something *else*. And his hand is off the gun. This did *something*...

fields.Title: You: "Don't say it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't say it.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Easy, now! Easy. Just tell them the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy, now! Easy. Just tell them these men didn't do it. There's a peaceful way out...

fields.Title: You: ""Just a question -- who's in charge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just a question -- who's in charge of your unit after the death of your colonel?"
fields.Alternate1: "Just to be clear -- are you officially in charge of this unit after the death of your colonel?"

fields.Title: You: ""As the leader of this group -- rec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As the leader of this group -- reconsider your actions. This does not need to end in bloodshed."

fields.Title: You: ""So you are the highest ranking of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you are the highest ranking of the three of you?"

fields.Title: You: "Gulp and say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Gulp and say nothing.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Not after this shit.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not after this shit."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It's a *miracle* no one got shot th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a *miracle* no one got shot this time. Stop attempting to use your *head*. It won't work!

fields.Title: The Gardener: "The woman has grown silent. She dra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman has grown silent. She draws shallow breaths.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "So you just *stand* there!? This is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So you just *stand* there!? This is bad, very bad, DO OR SAY SOMETHING NOW!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Say something. Get off this trail...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say something. Get off this trail. Thank god it's only *ineffectual* thus far.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Pops..." he says looking at your s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pops..." he says looking at your saggy sideburns -- they seem to calm him down for a second. "You have no idea about the rights Krenel extends to us."
fields.Alternate1: "Pops..." he says. "You have no idea about the rights Krenel extends to us."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""I am a Krenel major with over 15 y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a Krenel major with over 15 years of live-combat experience. When my colonel gets hanged by clay-monkeys I lead the platoon on a *retaliation strike*."
fields.Alternate1: "Me, I fucking *told* you -- I'm a Krenel major with 15 years of live-combat experience. When my colonel gets hanged by clay-monkeys I lead the platoon on a retaliation strike."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Really? None of this looks like it'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Really? None of this looks like it's going to do anything but piss him off.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The large man laughs. "Look around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The large man laughs. "Look around you, livestock... we're about to butcher the lot of you! Where is your *international law*?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "DON'T SAY IT? But now you've stood..."
fields.Dialogue Text: DON'T SAY IT? But now you've stood there scratching your ass for 1.5 seconds, you think this *helps* things?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Technically, the other man has the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Technically, the other man has the biggest gun, but... we're beyond that now.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't care. It's not okay to kil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care. It's not okay to kill civilians and local law enforcement officers."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "All right, here we go -- this is an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right, here we go -- this is an *illegal tribunal*. Their employer would never *sanction* this. Who's the *commanding officer*? Take your pick!
fields.Alternate1: All right, here we go -- this is an *illegal tribunal*. Krenel would never *sanction* this. Who's the *commanding officer*? Take your pick!

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "I have some *trivia* too! Get him *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I have some *trivia* too! Get him *interested* in facts!

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""King Reaper," he says without iron..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "King Reaper," he says without irony.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""If I fuck and kill you, hang you t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I fuck and kill you, hang you to that street light..." He points to it. "... by your shit-pipes -- then that's called a *necessary display of force*."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. What rights are those then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. What rights are those then?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There will be ramifications -- but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There will be ramifications -- but there don't need to be. Let's go inside and discuss what our investigation has uncovered. We have important..."
